name: The perfect coffee!
description:
You. A customer. An abnormaly big coffee maschine. Oh yeah, and of course a picture of yourself saying "Employee of the month"! 

This is the story of creating the perfect satisfaction of balancing the mixture of coffee and milk and let it cause an orgasmic explosion inside the head of your customers who are willing to pay you huge tips for your service!

Are you ready for this breathtaking experience? Then set yourself up a coffee and play this game!
